TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServicePointManager extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi ServicePointManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理 对象集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个静态类，用来创建、维护和删除类的实例 。 is a static class used to create, maintain, and delete instances of the class. 当应用程序请求连接到 Internet 资源统一资源标识符 (URI) 通过对象连接时 ，将 返回一个 对象，其中包含由 URI 标识的主机和方案的连接信息。When an application requests a connection to an Internet resource Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) through the object, the returns a object that contains connection information for the host and scheme identified by the URI. 如果存在 该主机和方案的现有对象，则该 对象将返回现有 对象; 否则，该对象会 创建一个新 的对象。If there is an existing object for that host and scheme, the object returns the existing object; otherwise, the object creates a new object. 4.6 .NET Framework 包括一项新的安全功能，用于阻止连接的不安全密码和哈希算法。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 默认情况下，通过 api 使用 TLS/SSL （如、、、、等 ） 和目标 .NET Framework 4.6 获取更安全的行为。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as , , , , , etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 开发人员可能需要选择退出此行为，以便与现有的 SSL3 服务或具有 RC4 服务的 TLS 保持互操作性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services or TLS w/ RC4 services. [本文](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) 介绍如何修改代码，以便禁用新行为。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，用于连接到 URI `www.contoso.com` 。The following code example creates a object for connections to the URI `www.contoso.com`. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器证书的策略。

span.span: Gets or sets policy for server certificates.

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 interface 对象时， 对象将使用该实例中定义的证书策略，而不是默认证书策略。When the property is set to an interface object, the object uses the certificate policy defined in that instance instead of the default certificate policy. 默认证书策略允许有效证书和已过期的有效证书。The default certificate policy allows valid certificates and valid certificates that have expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获自定义证书策略的证书策略例外。The following code example shows how to catch a certificate policy exception for a custom certificate policy. 它假定已经定义了证书策略对象，该变量中包含该 Web 资源 (URI) 的统一资源标识符， `myUri` 并且有一个名为的方法，该方法 `ProcessResponse` 用于执行应用程序的工作。It assumes that the certificate policy object has been defined, that the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the Web resource is contained in the variable `myUri`, and that there is a method named `ProcessResponse` that performs the work of the application. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示是否根据证书颁发机构吊销列表检查证书。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list.

value.span: 如果检查证书吊销列表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为时 `true` ，将对照证书颁发机构吊销列表检查证书，作为证书验证过程的一部分。When the is `true`, the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list, as part of the certificate validation process. 默认值为 `false`。Its default value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. summary.span: 获取或设置 对象所允许的最大并发连接数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 对象允许的最大并发连接数。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 对于 ASP.NET 托管的应用程序，默认的连接限制为10，对于所有其他值，则为2。

span.span: The default connection limit is 10 for ASP.NET hosted applications and 2 for all others.

value.span: 应用作为 ASP.NET 主机运行时，如果 autoConfig 属性设置为 ，则无法通过配置文件更改此属性的值。

span.span: When an app is running as an ASP.NET host, it is not possible to alter the value of this property through the config file if the autoConfig property is set to .

value.span: 但是，当 autoConfig 属性设置为 时，可以按编程方式更改值。

span.span: However, you can change the value programmatically when the autoConfig property is .

value.span: 当 AppDomain 加载时，设置一次首选值。

span.span: Set your preferred value once, when the AppDomain loads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置 对象在 创建对象时分配给属性的默认最大并发连接数 。The property sets the default maximum number of concurrent connections that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 更改 属性对现有对象没有影响 ; 它只影响在 更改后初始化的对象。Changing the property has no effect on existing objects; it affects only objects that are initialized after the change. 如果尚未直接或通过配置设置此属性的值，则该值默认为常量 。If the value of this property has not been set either directly or through configuration, the value defaults to the constant . > [!NOTE] > 对属性所做的任何更改 都会影响 http 1.0 和 http 1.1 连接。Any changes to the property affect both HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 connections. 不能单独改变 HTTP 1.0 和 HTTP 1.1 协议的连接限制。It is not possible to separately alter the connection limit for HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 protocols. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

span.span: is less than or equal to 0.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示域名服务 (DNS) 解析多长时间内视为有效。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution is considered valid.

value.span: 超时值（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The time-out value, in milliseconds.

value.span: 值 -1 指示超时期限无限。

span.span: A value of -1 indicates an infinite time-out period.

value.span: 默认值是 120,000 毫秒（2 分钟）。

span.span: The default value is 120,000 milliseconds (two minutes).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示域名服务 (DNS) 解析是否在多个适用的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址之间轮流进行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution rotates among the applicable Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

value.span: 如果 DNS 解析总是返回特定主机的第一个 IP 地址，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if a DNS resolution always returns the first IP address for a particular host; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多个 IP 地址与主机名相关联，则 DNS 解析通常只返回第一个 IP 地址。When more than one IP address is associated with a host name, a DNS resolution normally returns only the first IP address. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则后续的 DNS 解析将循环访问特定主机的所有可用 IP 地址。If you set this property to `true`, then subsequent DNS resolutions will cycle through all available IP addresses for a particular host. 当服务使用 DNS 作为服务器或服务器群集之间的负载平衡机制时，此选项很有用。This option is useful when a service uses DNS as a load balancing mechanism between servers or server clusters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/cpp/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the for this instance.

value.span: 用于此 实例的加密策略。

span.span: The encryption policy to use for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未在配置文件中指定值， 属性默认为 。If a value is not specified in the configuration file, the property defaults to . 这适用于此实例上的 SSL/TLS 会话 。This is applied to an SSL/TLS session on this instance. 当加密策略设置为时，需要使用 Null 密码 。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Expect100Continue { get; set; }
.property bool Expect100Continue
Public Shared Property Expect100Continue As Boolean
public: static property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Expect100Continue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定是否使用 100-Continue 行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 若要启用 100-Continue 行为，则为 。

span.span: to enable 100-Continue behavior.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，将使用 100-Continue 行为。When this property is set to `true`, 100-Continue behavior is used. `PUT` `POST` 如果 属性为 `true` ，并且 属性大于零或 属性为 true，则使用和方法的客户端请求将向请求添加预期标头。Client requests that use the `PUT` and `POST` methods will add an Expect header to the request if the property is `true` and property is greater than zero or the property is true. 客户端将从服务器接收到 100-Continue 响应，以指示客户端应发送要发送的数据。The client will expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 当基于请求标头的服务器要拒绝请求时，此机制可让客户端避免在网络上发送大量的数据。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假设 属性为 `false` 。For example, assume the property is `false`. 将请求发送到服务器时，它将包含数据。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果在读取请求标头后，服务器需要身份验证，并且必须发送401响应，则客户端必须使用正确的身份验证标头重新发送数据。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and must send a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则请求标头将发送到服务器。If this property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果服务器未拒绝请求，则会发送一个 100-Continue 响应，该响应将发送数据。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如前面的示例中所示，服务器需要身份验证，发送401响应，客户端不会不必要地传输数据。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 更改此属性的值不会影响现有 对象。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 只 会影响在更改后创建的新对象。Only new objects created after the change are affected. 即使将该属性设置为，也不会对 HTTP 1.0 请求使用 100-Continue 行为 `true` 。The 100-Continue behavior is not used for HTTP 1.0 requests even if this property is set to `true`. IETF RFC 2616 部分10.1.1 中完全介绍了预期 100-Continue 行为。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

summary.span: 查找现有的 对象或创建新的 对象来管理与指定 对象的通信。

span.span: Finds an existing object or creates a new object to manage communications with the specified object.

returns.span: 管理该请求的通信的 对象。

span.span: The object that manages communications for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回 与指定的 Internet 主机名称关联的对象。The method returns the object associated with the specified Internet host name. 如果 该主机不存在对象，则该 对象会创建一个。If no object exists for that host, the object creates one.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的最大空闲时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum idle time of a object.

value.span: 对象的最大空闲时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum idle time, in milliseconds, of a object.
The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置 对象在 创建对象时分配给该属性的最长空闲时间 。The property sets the maximum idle time that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 对此值所做的更改仅影响在 更改值后初始化的对象。Changes to this value affect only objects that are initialized after the value is changed. 对象在 中指定的时间空闲后 ，可以进行垃圾回收。After a object has been idle for the time specified in , it is eligible for garbage collection. 当与对象关联的连接列表为空时，对象处于空闲状态 。A object is idle when the list of connections associated with the object is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置任何时候保持的最大 对象数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of objects to maintain at any time.

value.span: 要保持的最大 对象数。

span.span: The maximum number of objects to maintain.

value.span: 默认值是 0，表示对 对象的数量没有限制。

span.span: The default value is 0, which means there is no limit to the number of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性减小到 当前存在的对象数以下，则会 删除 空闲时间最长的对象。When you reduce the property below the number of objects currently in existence, the deletes the objects with the longest idle times. 如果 具有活动连接的对象的数目大于的值 ，则当对象进入空闲状态时， 对象会删除这些 对象。If the number of objects with active connections is greater than the value of , the object deletes the objects as they become idle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#8)]

summary.span: 将此属性值设置为 会导致来自 HttpWebRequest 的所有出站 TCP 连接对套接字使用本机套接字选项 SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT。

span.span: Setting this property value to causes all outbound TCP connections from HttpWebRequest to use the native socket option SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT on the socket.

summary.span: 这会导致共享基础传出端口。

span.span: This causes the underlying outgoing ports to be shared.

summary.span: 这可用于在短时间内进行大量传出连接并且应用面临耗尽端口风险的情况。

span.span: This is useful for scenarios where a large number of outgoing connections are made in a short time, and the app risks running out of ports.

value.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 对象管理的 对象所使用的安全协议。

span.span: Gets or sets the security protocol used by the objects managed by the object.

value.span: 枚举中定义的值之一。

span.span: One of the values defined in the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性选择要用于新连接的安全套接字层 (SSL) 或传输层安全性 (TLS) 协议的版本;不会更改现有连接。This property selects the version of the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol to use for new connections; existing connections aren't changed. 从 .NET Framework 4.7 开始，此属性的默认值为 。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.7, the default value of this property is . 这允许基于 (（如 FTP、HTTP 和 SMTP) ）的 .NET Framework 网络 api 从操作系统或系统管理员执行的任何自定义配置继承默认安全协议。This allows .NET Framework networking APIs based on (such as FTP, HTTP, and SMTP) to inherit the default security protocols from the operating system or from any custom configurations performed by a system administrator. 有关默认情况下在每个版本的 Windows 操作系统上启用了哪些 SSL/TLS 协议的信息，请参阅 [TLS/SSL (SCHANNEL SSP) 中的协议 ](/windows/win32/secauthn/protocols-in-tls-ssl--schannel-ssp-)。For information about which SSL/TLS protocols are enabled by default on each version of the Windows operating system, see [Protocols in TLS/SSL (Schannel SSP)](/windows/win32/secauthn/protocols-in-tls-ssl--schannel-ssp-). 对于通过 .NET Framework 4.6.2 的 .NET Framework 版本，不会列出此属性的默认值。For versions of the .NET Framework through the .NET Framework 4.6.2, no default value is listed for this property. 安全环境不断变化，默认的协议和保护级别会随着时间的推移而更改，以避免已知的漏洞。The security landscape changes constantly, and default protocols and protection levels are changed over time in order to avoid known weaknesses. 默认值因单独的计算机配置、已安装的软件和应用的修补程序而异。Defaults vary depending on individual machine configuration, installed software, and applied patches. 你的代码决不会依赖于使用特定的保护级别，也不应假定默认情况下使用给定的安全级别。Your code should never implicitly depend on using a particular protection level, or on the assumption that a given security level is used by default. 如果你的应用依赖于使用特定的安全级别，则必须明确指定该级别，然后进行检查以确保在已建立的连接上实际使用了该安全级别。If your app depends on the use of a particular security level, you must explicitly specify that level and then check to be sure that it is actually in use on the established connection. 此外，你的代码应设计为在面对受支持的协议的更改时可靠，因为此类更改通常不需要提前通知就可以缓解新兴的威胁。Further, your code should be designed to be robust in the face of changes to which protocols are supported, as such changes are often made with little advance notice in order to mitigate emerging threats. 4.6 .NET Framework 包括一项新的安全功能，用于阻止连接的不安全密码和哈希算法。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 默认情况下，通过 Api 使用 TLS/SSL （如 HttpClient、HttpWebRequest、FTPClient、System.net.mail.smtpclient、System.net.security.sslstream 等）和目标 .NET Framework 4.6 获取更安全的行为。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 开发人员可能需要选择退出此行为，以便与现有的 SSL3 服务或具有 RC4 服务的 TLS 保持互操作性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [本文](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) 介绍如何修改代码，以便禁用新行为。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.

exception.span: 为设置属性而指定的值不是有效 枚举值。

span.span: The value specified to set the property is not a valid enumeration value.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证服务器证书的回调。

span.span: Gets or sets the callback to validate a server certificate.
A .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以将 属性设置为用于由服务器证书的客户端进行自定义验证的方法。An application can set the property to a method to use for custom validation by the client of the server certificate. 执行自定义验证时， `sender` 传递到的参数 可以是主机字符串名称或派生自 (的对象 ，例如) ，具体取决于 属性。When doing custom validation, the `sender` parameter passed to the can be a host string name or an object derived from (, for example) depending on the property. 如果未使用自定义验证，则会将证书名称与用于创建请求的主机名进行比较。When custom validation is not used, the certificate name is compared with the host name used to create the request. 例如，如果 向传递的参数，则 `"https://www.contoso.com/default.html"` 默认行为是让客户端检查证书 `www.contoso.com` 。For example, if was passed a parameter of `"https://www.contoso.com/default.html"`, the default behavior is for the client to check the certificate against `www.contoso.com`. 尽管是多路广播委托，但只有从上一次执行的事件处理程序返回的值被视为权威。Despite being a multicast delegate, only the value returned from the last-executed event handler is considered authoritative. 换句话说，你可以附加多个委托，它们均可从获取回调 。In other words, you can attach multiple delegates, and they all get a callback from . 每个回调都返回一个值，该值指示是否接受证书;但是，只考虑上一个委托中的值。Each callback returns a value that indicates whether the certificate is accepted or not; however, only the value from the last delegate is respected.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public static hidebysig void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: static void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
static member SetTcpKeepAlive : bool * int * int -> unit

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果设置为 true，则将使用指定的 和 值启用 TCP 连接上的 TCP keep-alive 选项。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified and values.

param.span: 如果设置为 false，则将禁用 TCP keep-alive 选项，并忽略剩余参数。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定当未收到确认消息时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 对 TCP 连接启用或禁用 keep-alive 选项。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以请求 TCP/IP 提供程序允许在 TCP 连接上使用 keep-alive 数据包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 默认情况下，禁用 TCP 连接上的 keep-alive 数据包。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. 初始化 TCP 套接字时，默认设置会将 keep-alive 超时设置为2小时，将 keep-alive 间隔设置为1秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime`参数指定在发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时值（以毫秒为单位）。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval`参数指定当未收到确认时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 不能更改 keep-alive 探测的数目，并将其设置为10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 连接作为 keep-alive 的结果被删除，则 的将 返回到套接字上正在进行的任何调用，并且任何后续调用都将失败，并返回 。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 为 或 参数指定的值小于等于 0.

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

summary.span: 确定由此 对象管理的服务点是否使用 Nagle 算法。

span.span: Determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used by the service points managed by this object.

value.span: 如果使用 Nagle 算法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 算法用于通过缓冲小数据包并将它们作为单个数据包传输来减少网络流量。The Nagle algorithm is used to reduce network traffic by buffering small packets of data and transmitting them as a single packet. 此过程也称为 "nagling";此方法广泛使用，因为它减少了传输的数据包数量并降低了每个数据包的开销。This process is also referred to as "nagling"; it is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 更改此属性的值不会影响现有 对象。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 只有在更改后创建的新服务点才会受到影响。Only new service points created after the change are affected. 在 IETF RFC 896 中，已完全介绍了 Nagle 算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]
